name: World Cup 2002: Group E Quiz / Test | FIFA World Cup | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Germany.

	Germany won the group by winning two games, drawing one and scored eleven goals in the process.

questions.text: Ireland vs Cameroon: who scored the goals in this 1-1 draw?
questions.explanation:
Matt Holland (Ireland) & Patrick Mboma (Cameroon).

	Mboma opened the scoring in the 39th minute and Matt Holland equalized in the 52nd minute to give Ireland a share of the points.

questions.text: Germany vs Saudi Arabia: what was the full-time score in this match?
questions.explanation:
Germany 8 Saudi Arabia 0.

	Germany set a national record by recording their biggest ever World Cup winning margin in a match.

questions.text: Germany vs Saudi Arabia: who scored a hat-trick in this game?
questions.explanation:
Miroslav Klose.

	Klose's goals came in the 20th, 25th and 70th minutes. All three were headers.

questions.text: Germany vs Ireland: who scored an injury time equalizer to end the game 1-1?
questions.explanation:
Robbie Keane (Ireland).

	Germany took the lead through Klose in the 19th minute, only for Keane to level the scores with 92 minutes on the clock.

questions.text: Cameroon vs Saudi Arabia: who had a goal disallowed for Cameroon?
questions.explanation:
Patrick Mboma.

	Cameroon won the game 1-0 with Samuel Eto'o scoring in the 66th minute, while the Saudi's became the first team to be eliminated from the World Cup.

questions.text: Cameroon vs Germany: both teams had a man sent off, but who were they?
questions.explanation:
Carsten Ramelow (Germany) & Patrick Suffo (Cameroon).

	Ramelow got his marching orders in the 40th minute for a second yellow card, while Suffo saw red in the 77th minute. Germany went on to win the game 2-0.

questions.text: Saudi Arabia vs Ireland: Ireland needed to win by two clear goals to progress through to the second round. What was the final score?
questions.explanation:
Saudi Arabia 0 Ireland 3.

	Robbie Keane, Gary Breen and Damien Duff scored the goals that ensured Ireland would meet Spain in the second round.

questions.text: Who did Germany go on to meet in the second round?
questions.explanation:
Paraguay.

	Germany beat Paraguay in the second round thanks to an Oliver Neuville goal in the 88th minute.

questions.text: Who did Ireland, as runners-up of the group, go on to meet in the second round?
questions.explanation:
Spain.

	Ireland were losing 1-0 in normal time in the second round meeting with Spain before Robbie Keane score an injury time equaliser. They eventually lost 3-2 on penalties.
